1.title: Back to Nature
1.plot: Rodman confronts a major loss in his life by re-connecting with nature.

2.title: Freegan Awesome!
2.plot: Rodman and Gina confront a culture of food waste and introduced to freegan culture by renowned forager, Ethan Welte.

3.title: Up-cycled Art and Fashion
3.plot: Rodman and Gina learn all about how one man's trash can be anyone's treasure....with a little creativity and skill, of course.

4.title: Zero Waste: Home and Office
4.plot: Rodman and Gina come face to face with how their habits contribute to the United States growing "waste" problem.

5.title: Living Small
5.plot: Rodman and Gina learn all about the tiny home trend. Shipping containers, tiny houses and hand made homesteads await them in this episode of Urban Conversion.

6.title: Alternative Building
6.plot: Rodman and Gina go against the grain to discover alternative building methods. Recycling tires to create foundations, retro fitting old gas guzzling homes to be super energy efficient and straw bale construction await.

7.title: Clean Energy 101
7.plot: Rodman learns about climate change and how switching to renewable energies like wind and solar can have big impacts on his families future.

1.title: Backyard Farmer
1.plot: Beginning a journey to reduce his family's carbon footprint, Rodman Schley explores the world of backyard farming with urban agriculture guru Sundari Kraft. He finds himself out of his element milking goats, taking care of chickens and learning how to use natural fertilizer to sustain a backyard ecosystem.

2.title: The Burbs and the Bees
2.plot: Rodman faces his fears and learns the importance of bees in our everyday ecosystem through holistic bee keeping...a.k.a. bee keeping without a suit.

3.title: My Alternative Fuel Future
3.plot: Could an alternatively fueled car be in Rodman's future? Rodman learns what's down the road for Hydrogen fuels, gets his hands dirty collecting bio diesel, and is shocked to learn about a mechanical shop that converts classic cars to electric.

4.title: Green YoU
4.plot: Rodman goes back to school to learn how one campus is leading the way towards sustainability in higher education. He will be living, learning and putting one up for the home team as a "non-traditional" student.

5.title: Detroit Urban Farming
5.plot: Rodman sees first-hand the positive effects of urban farming as it shapes a new identity for the Detroit community. Leading the way is Taja Seville and Urban Farming, who takes him into the city to see where hope is springing up from vacant lots and community run programs.

6.title: Rodman Needs a Hobby/Home Brewing
6.plot: Gina, forever hopeful that Rodman will embrace a sustainable lifestyle encourages Rodman to find a hobby. Rodman discovers the hands on fun, art, process and warmth found in the home brewing community.

7.title: Farm to Table?
7.plot: Date night at a farm to table restaurant sends Rodman and Gina on a mission to follow their food back to its roots, volunteering at a local organic market farm. While putting their hands to the dirt, they go beyond the buzzwords to see what goes into local, bio diverse, organic growing. The reward? A farm dinner that reminds them food is about community.

8.title: Urban Gardening, the Whitehouse and Monticello
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: The only thing more important to Businessman and entrepreneur Rodman Schley than creating new opportunities and businesses is his family. After his wife, Gina, makes it clear it's time to simplify their fast-paced modern lifestyle and lead a greener life, Rodman is inspired to discover what he can about the movement to see what will work for him. Whether it's milking a goat in a backyard urban farm, learning how to do his part to save the bee population while working with a holistic bee keeper, or seeing how communities in Detroit are strengthening and healing themselves by tending to community gardens, Rodman is ready to look at this movement with fresh eyes.
imdb.title: Urban Conversion
plot: Businessman and entrepreneur Rodman Schley is inspired to learn more about the sustainability movement in order to get on the same page with his wife, Gina, who is wanting to simplify their fast- paced, modern lifestyle.::_Urban Conversion_ (qv)
